February 11 — The CIA establishes a Domestic Operations Division for its clandestine services, conducted within the US against “foreign targets.” ()

February 15 — 7:10 a.m. Farmer Charles Brew and his son Trevor are in a shed, milking a herd of cows near Moe, Victoria, Australia. Charles sees an object descend very steeply out of the east from a low cloud, at about a 45° angle. The UFO is about 25 feet in diameter, and about 9–10 feet high. The lower portion, about 3 feet high, is rotating in an anticlockwise direction and is bluish. The upper portion appears to be stationary, battleship-gray in color, with a transparent dome on top. Protruding out of the dome is something resembling a broom handle. A sound, described as swishing or burbling, is heard by both Charles and Trevor. (NICAP, “[Rotating Object and](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.nicap.org/630215tasmania_dir.htm&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923858574&usg=AOvVaw2RCw1R2klPR_4bYffvoqVB) [Animal Reaction](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.nicap.org/630215tasmania_dir.htm&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923858741&usg=AOvVaw3j-F2zOj0_i3tgYDfy-FOl)”; Bill Chalker, “Tully Saucer Nests of 1966, Part Two,” IUR 23, no. 1 (Spring 1998): 15–16; [Sparks](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.nicap.org/bb/BB_Unknowns.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923859002&usg=AOvVaw36TKMUER42APVHrcI8VjKg)[,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.nicap.org/bb/BB_Unknowns.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923859140&usg=AOvVaw1qAQ3vAxudnY9nuWuqTkbz) p. 293; Swords 388–390)

February 23 — 9:45 p.m. An oval object is seen in the sky above Highcliffe, Dorset, England. Emerald-green in color and surrounded by a glow, it hangs in the sky for 10 minutes before witnesses see two smaller objects emerge from it. These fly away and disappear over the English Channel. (Herbert S. Taylor, “Satellite Objects and Cloud Cigars,” IUR 29, no. 1 (Spring 2004): 10)

March — Austrian ufologist [Luis Schoenherr](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://paschberg.blogspot.com/2010/10/am-7.html&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923859629&usg=AOvVaw2mTC7DUlZXDc4JX_ho9PK8) offers a paranormal explanation for UFOs, saying that they either emanate from an unobservable fourth dimension or are time machines. (Luis Schoenherr, “[UFOs and the Fourth](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%252C1963%252CFeb-Mar%252CV%25209%252CN%25202.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923859894&usg=AOvVaw3nX1dMJponBvyV_fiurbDj) [Dimension,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%252C1963%252CFeb-Mar%252CV%25209%252CN%25202.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923860108&usg=AOvVaw2_-2eGnys4W3icFdJvGNK5)” Flying Saucer Review 9, no. 2 (March/April 1963): 10–12; Luis Schoenherr, “[UFOs and the Fourth](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%252C1964%252CJan-Feb%252CV%252010%252CN%25201.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923860392&usg=AOvVaw0Jl84BHDWa5YAiXLOSncCP) [Dimension, Part 2,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%252C1964%252CJan-Feb%252CV%252010%252CN%25201.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923860587&usg=AOvVaw0bhvlN1bj9WZ43c2v3Q9FT)” Flying Saucer Review 10, no. 1 (Jan./Feb. 1964): 16–20, 23)

March 3 — The [Hills](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barney_and_Betty_Hill&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923860936&usg=AOvVaw0aiAwZ-XPBOlNpgDrWzsV6) are invited by their Unitarian church to discuss their UFO experience. They speak about it for the first time publicly. (Clark III 584)

April — An article by [J. Allen Hynek](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._Allen_Hynek&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923861364&usg=AOvVaw3lU_17b6aKjrgc8k1tMwM_) appears in the Yale Scientific Magazine. (J. Allen Hynek, “Flying Saucers I Have Known,” Yale Scientific Magazine 37 (April 1963): 6–9; Loren E. Gross, [The Fifth Horseman of the Apocalypse:](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-Jan-Jun.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923861770&usg=AOvVaw3hkg_qjF-HuPfY73bO1s9U) [UFOs, a History: January–June 1963](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-Jan-Jun.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923861994&usg=AOvVaw06cB4YScZ9NjYRN_2bot9u)[,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-Jan-Jun.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923862151&usg=AOvVaw09Ngj_isQMZjABWetLsFKG) The Author, 2005, pp. 42–62)

April 30 — [Adamski](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Adamski&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923862445&usg=AOvVaw1vtwpN3boCQ2dOjQhKHPnf) arrives in Copenhagen for another scheduled lecture tour of Europe at the invitation of Hans C. Petersen, He attends the Skandinavisk UFO Information Congress in Frederica, Denmark. (“[Final Years,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.the-adamski-case.nl/his-life/final-years/&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923862837&usg=AOvVaw0YwmFoOpatgty_sAKvxUKw)” The Adamski Case, June 11, 2009)

May 15 — Sandia National Laboratories conducts the first of four top-secret, dry-surface plutonium-dispersal tests at the Tonopah Test Range in Nevada, as part of Operation Roller Coaster. The other tests are on May 25, May 31, and June 9. The intent is to investigate exposure of animals (dogs, sheep, and burros) to plutonium dispersal in a non- nuclear scenario. (Wikipedia, “[Operation Roller Coaster](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Operation_Roller_Coaster&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923863320&usg=AOvVaw1D97c-Uxo1LTqhATVvwa5a)”; Lt. Col. J. L. Dick, et al., “[Operation Roller Coaster:](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.osti.gov/opennet/servlets/purl/16004569.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923863510&usg=AOvVaw30NlzR0QkKPerVYuO338HK) [Interim Summary Report (II),](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.osti.gov/opennet/servlets/purl/16004569.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923863794&usg=AOvVaw0W00FQmbGdnYrHHiLS1QDj)” Department of Defense, September 1963)

May 24 — An A-12 piloted by [Kenneth S. Collins](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.sltrib.com/article.php?id%3D51976355%26itype%3Dcmsid&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923864135&usg=AOvVaw0P6Ti4zGKI3sA9o_-uqBCK) crashes near Wendover, Utah. The CIA thinks it might have been due to pilot error and contracts with a well-known Boston, Massachusetts, psychiatrist with a specialty in hypnosis (unnamed, but possibly Benjamin Simon, of [Betty and Barney Hill](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barney_and_Betty_Hill&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923864383&usg=AOvVaw3oE5PZkogCdp2dwcId34AR) fame later). After a lengthy investigation it is determined that a tiny, pencil-sized part called a pilot tube, a device that controls the airspeed indicator, froze when the A-12 entered a cloud, causing the aircraft to stall. (Wikipedia, “[Lockheed A-12](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lockheed_A-12%23Accidents_and_incidents&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923864621&usg=AOvVaw0ZgQQ_bh4GNL7YVlumX6VQ)”; Jacobsen, Area 51, [pp.](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/area51uncensored0000jaco/page/190/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923864884&usg=AOvVaw3WBaWcb9dQZoPNgyiP9m1u) [190–197](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/area51uncensored0000jaco/page/190/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923865083&usg=AOvVaw1jWfbYxSDdAHTUznwlovkw))

May 31 — [Adamski](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Adamski&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923865329&usg=AOvVaw2nI9VPWDq3WZMmw5Zz-azK) allegedly has a private audience with Pope [John XXIII](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pope_John_XXIII&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923865548&usg=AOvVaw2veR4a9sm6c1cplF0XPjYH) in Rome, Italy. The pontiff is seriously ill and dies three days later. Adamski claims that he has received a “Golden Medal of Honor” from the pope, but skeptics note that the medal is actually a common tourist souvenir made by a company in Milan, and that Adamski displays it to his friends in a cheap plastic box—which is how it is sold in tourist shops in Rome. Adamski says his meeting is at the request of the extraterrestrials he is in contact with in order to ask for a “final agreement” from the pope because of his decision not to communicate directly with them anymore and to offer John XXIII a liquid substance in order to save him from the gastric enteritis that he suffers from. (Lou Zinsstag and Timothy Good, George Adamski: The Untold Story, Ceti, 1983; Colin Bennett, Looking for Orthon, Paraview, 2001;

* * *

“[Vatican Visit,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.the-adamski-case.nl/his-mission/vatican-visit/&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923866463&usg=AOvVaw1b3DkD9bN7WJJzIyL7RWbT)” The Adamski Case, October 7, 2019; Marc Hallet, [A Critical Appraisal of George Adamski: The](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/ACriticalAppraisalOfGeorgeAdamskiTheManWhoSpokeToTheSpaceBrothersREVISEDANDENLARGEDEDITION2016/page/n1/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923866874&usg=AOvVaw0QQP87bVsxKAD2DkbbVsQm) [Man Who Spoke to the Space Brothers](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/ACriticalAppraisalOfGeorgeAdamskiTheManWhoSpokeToTheSpaceBrothersREVISEDANDENLARGEDEDITION2016/page/n1/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923867142&usg=AOvVaw3KgQaFySgwjM_zK9_1MaSa)[,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/ACriticalAppraisalOfGeorgeAdamskiTheManWhoSpokeToTheSpaceBrothersREVISEDANDENLARGEDEDITION2016/page/n1/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923867397&usg=AOvVaw3L9VHS4udaV0PHiVitRnC1) The Author, 2016)

Summer — [Allen H. Greenfield](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Allen_H._Greenfield&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923867970&usg=AOvVaw0eql1LSPHbkFrrOIxsk1T6) and [Rick Hilberg](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.mufonohio.com/mufono/2015confSUMM.html&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923868317&usg=AOvVaw1oJxPasFwc0LtzkaTdgfWK) start publishing Saucer Album in Cleveland, Ohio. It becomes UFO Magazine in mid-1964 and continues through the summer of 1970. After a few years’ hiatus, it returns as UFO Magazine News Bulletin in early 1974 and continues at least until February 1979. ([Saucer Album](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://files.afu.se/Downloads/Magazines/United%2520States/UFO%2520Magazine%2520(Hilberg)/UFO%2520Magazine%2520-%2520vol%25201%2520number%25201%2520-%2520Saucer%2520Album.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923868925&usg=AOvVaw2BBP-WXqgXDuESsCfglXBL) 1, no. 1 (Summer 1963))

June 15 — 8:39 p.m. In the Indian Ocean southwest of India, 3rd Mate R. C. Chamberlin of the SS Thetis sees in the northwest a luminous disc travel at 1.5 times the angular speed of a satellite. ([Sparks](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.nicap.org/bb/BB_Unknowns.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923869636&usg=AOvVaw0QmfSmvgxuwz9mLYuRHH7y)[,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.nicap.org/bb/BB_Unknowns.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923869789&usg=AOvVaw1rh4E9i6wGHw4LKi5pTV9E) p. 294)

June 26 — Around 1:00 a.m. Enrico A. Gilberti Jr. and his wife Janet are awakened at their home on 344 Commercial Street, Weymouth, Massachusetts, by a loud roar. They look out the window and see a Saturn-shaped object moving slowly above the treetops 100 feet off the ground and 300 feet away. Gilberti describes it as “two hamburger buns one on top of another with a sandwiched piece of meat protruding around.” It is about 30–40 feet across and has two brilliant lights. The UFO follows some power lines across a field and disappears to the northeast. “The roar was deafening.” Neighbors hear the noise but do not see anything. (Loren E. Gross, [The Fifth](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-Jan-Jun.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923870143&usg=AOvVaw0cGzJWtQCF3DOz4ep3YzuU) [Horseman of the Apocalypse: UFOs, a History: January–June 1963](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-Jan-Jun.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923870350&usg=AOvVaw2AjxHhgl4pi4kfUkWJgiT_), The Author, 2005, pp. 84–85)

June 26 — Four glowing greenish objects with halos are seen by a technician and many others at Pinecrest, California. Three objects moving westerly are approached by a similar object from the west. The fourth object stops and hovers as the three approach, split formation, and continue west. Then the fourth object continues east. (UFOEv, [p. 140](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://babel.hathitrust.org/cgi/pt?id%3Dmdp.39015006091691%26view%3D1up%26seq%3D152%26skin%3D2021&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923870690&usg=AOvVaw27fNjhbOHtg56-DoDRyhLd))

June 28 — 9:30 p.m. A man is driving along the Lyndoch-Gawler Road near Sandy Creek, South Australia, when he comes across a blood-red, glowing object, 25 feet across and 12 feet high, in the road ahead. He is within 12 feet of it when he hits the brakes. The object turns a lighter reddish-yellow and rises up into the air several hundred feet. It turns on its side and speeds away. This and other UFO incidents cause Sen. [Jim Cavanagh](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Cavanagh&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923871065&usg=AOvVaw11LBXiXAx3XjXLHHC_rsvq) to ask the federal government to make its UFO dossier public, but Minister for Air [David Fairbairn](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Fairbairn_(politician)&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923871301&usg=AOvVaw1PCHEkjTPYenwefkqBeLeE) refuses, saying that the vast majority of reports are explainable. (Loren E. Gross, [The Fifth Horseman of the Apocalypse: UFOs, a](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-Jan-Jun.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923871525&usg=AOvVaw1U6Sb_Yb_5ji2m8hnOyW6v) [History: January–June 1963](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-Jan-Jun.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923871715&usg=AOvVaw3i21Tgb9mtD2qMoJ_M0mE0)[,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-Jan-Jun.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923871884&usg=AOvVaw3gBudIVa10OJXKcSqLN2IT) The Author, 2005, pp. 86–87)

July — The CIA has synthesized many of the findings from its psychological research into what became known as the “KUBARK Counterintelligence Interrogation” handbook, which cites the MKUltra studies and other secret research programs as the scientific basis for their interrogation methods. [Donald Ewen Cameron](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Ewen_Cameron&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923872257&usg=AOvVaw260gVrFc6IX9bEd1q4cES3) regularly travels around the US teaching military personnel about his techniques (hooding of prisoners for sensory deprivation, prolonged isolation, humiliation, etc.), and how they can be used in interrogations. Latin American paramilitary groups working for the CIA and US military personnel receive training in these psychological techniques at places such as the School of the Americas in Fort Benning, Georgia. (In the 21st century, many of these torture techniques are used at US military and CIA prisons such as Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, and Abu Ghraib, Iraq.) In the aftermath of the 1975 congressional hearings, major news media mainly focus on sensational stories related to LSD, mind-control, and brainwashing, and rarely use the word “torture.” This suggests that the CIA researchers are, as one author put it, “a bunch of bumbling sci-fi buffoons” rather than a rational group of men who have run torture laboratories and medical experiments in major US universities; they have arranged for torture, rape, and psychological abuse of adults and young children, driving many of them permanently insane. (Central Intelligence Agency, “[KUBARK Counterintelligence Interrogation](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://nsarchive2.gwu.edu/NSAEBB/NSAEBB122/CIA%2520Kubark%25201-60.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923872604&usg=AOvVaw1JfA-5Hh8n06tk6a6c8-Qw),” July 1963; Wikipedia, “[Unethical human](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unethical_human_experimentation_in_the_United_States%23Concerns&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923872808&usg=AOvVaw1q5h4PvJ05DeLR1m4dHeHb) [experimentation in the United States](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unethical_human_experimentation_in_the_United_States%23Concerns&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923873033&usg=AOvVaw2q1BElDkd9BB8SDXQg-HEF)”)

July 2 — Nineteen-year-old NICAP member [John P. Speights](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.northcarolinaresidentdatabase.com/person/14622338/john-speights&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923873303&usg=AOvVaw2KY7lgkFzg_45faz5Noqkm) of Raleigh, North Carolina, writes a letter questioning the Air Force’s treatment of UFOs to Rep. [Carl Vinson](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Vinson&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923873505&usg=AOvVaw2nZ_RDbsgNtDE5Lx4eFjqe) (D-Ga.), chairman of the House Armed Services Committee. Vinson forwards it to USAF along with his own request for information on Blue Book. The Air Force treats the request gingerly because of the implication of a congressional hearing and prepares a reply to Vinson on July 18, but there is no evidence that it is sent. USAF Maj. [Maston M. Jacks](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.dailypress.com/news/dp-xpm-19981013-1998-10-13-9810130089-story.html&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923873784&usg=AOvVaw1RUuFZ_NnaVv0HnQggzMWl) does reply to Speights on August 5. (Loren E. Gross, [The Fifth Horseman of the Apocalypse: UFOs, a History: July–December 1963](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-July-Dec.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923874033&usg=AOvVaw2DEP7rPYoQrYy_SrcpKVQU)[,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-July-Dec.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923874183&usg=AOvVaw01IvVT59ChrzJ6fo7Erl7p) The Author, 2005, pp.

19–20; US Air Force, Foreign Technology Division, “[Congressional Correspondence on the U.S. Air Force UFO](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://files.afu.se/Downloads/Documents/USA%2520-%2520Congress/1962%2520-%2520Congressional%2520correspondence.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923874555&usg=AOvVaw3Z-FkHyqLsNO9yLf5lWZnW) [Program, Congressman Carl Vinson](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://files.afu.se/Downloads/Documents/USA%2520-%2520Congress/1962%2520-%2520Congressional%2520correspondence.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923874842&usg=AOvVaw2aV6gqIxUqkric7sNU5WOk)”)

July 16 — Farmer Roy Blanchard of Charlton, Wiltshire, England, discovers a strange crater on the ground overlapping his potato and barley fields. It is about 8 feet wide and 4 inches deep. A hole in the center is 3 feet deep and less than a foot in diameter. All vegetation inside the circle is burned, leaving only bare earth, and there are four slots in the ground around it, each about 4 feet long and a foot wide. A small piece of metal is found. Astronomer [Patrick Moore](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patrick_Moore&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923875182&usg=AOvVaw0Yjatwtx0FgnefcxdiNl2G) states that a “shrimp-sized meteorite” has caused the crater. But a military investigation shows no

burn or scratch marks or any trace of an explosion. (Loren E. July 20 — An A-1 piloted by [Louis Schalk](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Schalk&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923878375&usg=AOvVaw1pbWJFsw_ikWDTK0rb_SFZ) briefly achieves a speed of Mach 3 for the first time. (Jacobsen, Area 51, [p.](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/area51uncensored0000jaco/page/200/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923878704&usg=AOvVaw3SLYQjbqgV_AVAK7wuiQS8)

[201](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/area51uncensored0000jaco/page/200/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923879071&usg=AOvVaw2Yq-ex9k0sx7Ep2oRVVVd4))

August 1 — Evening. A former RAF pilot and flight instructor sees a triangular UFO that lingers for a long time over Garston, Hertfordshire, England, then climbs out of sight. Thousands of other people in the London area, including an air traffic controller four miles away and future UFO researcher [Timothy Good](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Timothy_Good&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923879407&usg=AOvVaw0AobPsnMeWdBvGTltks9eO) in Bcckenham, London, also see the object, which has a tetrahedral shape and glassy appearance when seen through binoculars. A USAF F-100 Super Sabre from RAF Bentwaters \[now Bentwaters Parks\] in Woodbridge, Suffolk, and another plane from the De Havilland Aircraft Company are sent up to investigate but cannot get anywhere near the UFO, which is at an estimated 90,000 feet. An amateur astronomer in Bushey, Hertfordshire, takes a clear photo. The official explanation is a balloon. (UFOEv, [p. 141](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://babel.hathitrust.org/cgi/pt?id%3Dmdp.39015006091691%26view%3D1up%26seq%3D153%26skin%3D2021&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923879666&usg=AOvVaw3Hc5KRFnRYFjsGxYGR8mlJ); Good Above, [p. 149](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/B-001-014-055/page/148/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923879880&usg=AOvVaw18yMsBpnwo89FJuFq3cwGA))

August 4 — 11:30 p.m. Ronnie Austin and Phyllis Bruce are driving east on State Highway 15 past the Mount Vernon, Illinois, airport when they notice a bright white round object about 20° above the southwest horizon. It seems to be keeping pace with them for several miles. Suddenly it moves about 600 feet in front of them and to the left. When Austin drops Phyllis off at home in Wayne City, it is hanging in the southeast. They continue watching it about 15 minutes, then Austin leaves for home. As he turns east on a gravel road, it shoots ahead of him, taking on an orange hue. At one point it comes within 100 feet of his car, swerves upward, and passes above him as the car radio makes a whining noise and the car engine almost fails. The object then moves behind him from west to east. When he arrives home, it is hovering about 900 feet to the southeast. Ronnie is so shaken, he is given a sedative. His parents, Mr. and Mrs. Orville Austin, and brother and sister also see the light, which finally becomes indistinguishable with a star by 1:10 a.m. (NICAP, “[The Wayne City Car Chase (EM RA Traces)](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.nicap.org/630804waynecity_dir.htm&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923880206&usg=AOvVaw0MQsdI-TgsYejOqNsA9V9d)”; Jeffrey Liss, “The Light That Followed a Car,” Fate 16, no. 11 (November 1963): 26–35; [Schopick](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://cufos.org/books/A_Study_of_Secondary_Effects-An_Unpublished_Manuscript_of_UFO_E-M_Cases.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923880481&usg=AOvVaw3XxwwD7RiBnbhcSPUYsoCA), pp. 81–88)

August 5 — The Partial Nuclear Test Ban Treaty is signed by the USSR, UK, and US governments in Moscow, Russia, before being opened for signature by other countries. The treaty formally goes into effect on October 10. The treaty prohibits all above-ground tests of nuclear weapons. (Wikipedia, “[Partial Nuclear Test Ban Treaty](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Partial_Nuclear_Test_Ban_Treaty&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923880761&usg=AOvVaw0IdLPT3qWWhNbThDY6F89W)”)

August 7 — The first flight of the USAF version of the A-12, the Lockheed YF-12 interceptor, takes place at Edwards AFB in California. (Wikipedia, “[Lockheed YF-12](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lockheed_YF-12&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923881033&usg=AOvVaw02s7dB029u2Ig7pri-pbfK)”)

August 10 — 9:32 p.m. Several airmen of the 91st Bombardment Wing at Glasgow Air Force Base \[now closed\] near Glasgow, Montana, are walking in the parking lot when a bright light appears above them, bathing everyone in an orange glow. It is coming from a disc-shaped object with a dome that has some odd characters carved in it. The object moves up, then to the right, then down and left. It makes a square, then an X within the square, stopping at all points before moving again. The underside of the object is a large panel of blue light. They watch it for 3 minutes then it disappears. (“[Out of the Past,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://cufos.org/CUFOS_Associate_Newsletter/1985_CUFOS_Associate_Newsletter_V6.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923881404&usg=AOvVaw2cUP2QO9ep6o4-NUN1sSgK)” CUFOS Associate Newsletter 6, no. 2 (April/May 1985): 3)

August 20 — 9:30 p.m. Italian President [Antonio Segni](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antonio_Segni&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923881866&usg=AOvVaw3W2QL20YefeAdgMGz6ywq6)’s personal driver encounters a UFO near the entrance of the Castel Porziano Presidential Estate in Rome, Italy. When he sees a metallic domed disc with portholes moving in front of him in the driveway ahead, the driver stops the Fiat 2300 immediately. The UFO, about 65 feet diameter, passes a few feet above the car, making a hissing noise and causing the body to vibrate and the instruments to go crazy, then reverses course and passes over the car again with the same effect. It then tilts 90° and darts away to the west. It leaves behind a smell of heated metal. (1Pinotti 148–151; “[Quando gli UFO arrivarona anche in](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.ogginotizie.it/quando-gli-ufo-arrivarono-anche-in-italia/&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923882273&usg=AOvVaw1U-zwUbDMf60AXPOg5gBaY) [Italia,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.ogginotizie.it/quando-gli-ufo-arrivarono-anche-in-italia/&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923882557&usg=AOvVaw3yiXAAqULrA5NzNZUjzn2V)” Oggi Notizie, November 26, 2011)

August 22 — Test pilot [Joseph A. Walker](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_A._Walker&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923882896&usg=AOvVaw21lBjK35uTL3z09M58V1VW) reaches an altitude of 353,200 feet (66.9 miles) in an X-15 rocket plane. (Wikipedia, “[Joseph A. Walker](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_A._Walker&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923883113&usg=AOvVaw0macwFNdxNmAZ9yxjJDtvg)”)

August 28 — After the March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom, [J. Edgar Hoover](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._Edgar_Hoover&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923883355&usg=AOvVaw2rRTdTJ0y0t0gQvBmj9fy6) singles out Rev. [Martin Luther](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martin_Luther_King_Jr&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923883560&usg=AOvVaw1xCQmVqwtH0RDl4v13ai5U) [King Jr](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martin_Luther_King_Jr&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923883846&usg=AOvVaw1Nz2wf862ClpIYoddQSWNa)[.](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martin_Luther_King_Jr&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923884018&usg=AOvVaw2u18JvFSlW47haeAcrAUNn) as a major target for COINTELPRO. Soon after, the FBI is systematically bugging King’s home and his hotel rooms, as they are now aware that King is growing in stature daily as the leader among leaders of the Civil Rights Movement. (Wikipedia, “[COINTELPRO](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/COINTELPRO%23History&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923884277&usg=AOvVaw2s8Q2W7gXdsj7VohJ1tdcS)”)

August 28 — 7:00 p.m. José Marcos Gomes Vidal, 7, and his friends Fernando, 12, and Ronaldo Gualberto, 7, are in the Gualbertos’s backyard in Sagrada Familia, Belo Horizonte, Brazil, to wash a coffee strainer in a cistern.

Suddenly, Fernando notices a glow coming from the top of an avocado tree. When he looks up, he sees a UFO hovering above the tree’s branches. The craft, which is spherical and has a pair of antennas on top, is completely transparent. It holds four human-like passengers sitting inside, one of whom sits in front of a machine that appears

* * *

to be a control panel. The passengers are about 6 feet tall and dressed in spacesuits. They all have only one eye like a cyclops. Three of them are thin and bald, while the other looks like an overweight woman with blonde hair. The UFO shoots out two rays of yellow light. One of the cyclops appears between the lights, slowly floating down onto the ground. Once his boots touched the earth, the creature begins to walk toward José, who is completely unaware of what is happening since he is still collecting water. Fernando panics and tackles José, who falls to the ground, and Fernando gets back up and faces the cyclops. Now all three boys are aware of the visitor. The

cyclops moves his head and makes hand signals. It speaks a few sounds in a strange language. The creature then turns around and stares back at the UFO. Fernando, spotting a brick on the ground, picks it up and aims it at the cyclops, who turns around and shoots Fernando’s hand with a yellow light from a triangular crest on his chest. Fernando drops the brick, and all three of the boys become calm and frozen. For a few more minutes, the cyclops speaks to them, then it points one of his fingers at the moon and begins to walk back toward the UFO. José asks if he will ever come back. The cyclops shakes his head affirmatively, plucks a plant from the ground, and then waves his hand at the UFO, which shoots out two rays of yellow light again. The cyclops slowly floats back up into the vehicle, and the UFO takes off eastward and disappears out of their sight. (Brazil 66–72; Tristan, “[The](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://bizarreandgrotesque.com/2016/03/24/the-alien-cyclops-of-sagrada-familia/&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923885350&usg=AOvVaw0S1Be_MGyqYajIy4vdIb1p) [Alien Cyclops of Sagrada Familia,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://bizarreandgrotesque.com/2016/03/24/the-alien-cyclops-of-sagrada-familia/&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923885571&usg=AOvVaw3ePDu1vw3eASxGm7MLx6iu)” Bizarre and Grotesque, March 24, 2016)

September — Lt. Col. [Robert J. Friend](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Friend_(pilot)&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923885902&usg=AOvVaw0S1sHLS7vNIIJjVt97Kfnb) leaves Project Blue Book and is replaced by Maj. [Hector Quintanilla](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hector_Quintanilla&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923886117&usg=AOvVaw27KYldUA636P-730E4pNti). (Hynek UFO Report, [pp. 25–27](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/hynekuforeport00alle/page/24/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923886337&usg=AOvVaw1Zk2trHximHe99BBRLSaNw); [Sparks](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.nicap.org/bb/BB_Unknowns.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923886497&usg=AOvVaw1SZ1hvcQvYPCXf_i5ltFSs)[,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.nicap.org/bb/BB_Unknowns.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923886616&usg=AOvVaw1DbNTq42OHS9FLSM9kIS1f) p. 14)

September 7 — Capt. [Swett](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/201838384/ben-h_-swett&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923886883&usg=AOvVaw3CbMrigRrOH7Ir9bHxwv3r) gives a formal lecture on hypnosis to a meeting at the Unitarian Church in Portsmouth, New Hampshire. After the lecture, the [Hills](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barney_and_Betty_Hill&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923887107&usg=AOvVaw2-2F1XrdIRrQlbV4k_RBNp) tell him that Barney was going to a psychiatrist, Duncan Stephens, whom he likes and trusts. Swett suggests that Barney ask Stephens about the use of hypnosis in his case. At his next therapy session, Barney mentions his UFO encounter to Stephens, who recommends Dr. Benjamin Simon, a well- known psychiatrist in Boston, Massachusetts, with much experience in hypnosis. ()

September 12 — Patrick Loreno and 18 other men aboard Texas Tower 2, a USAF radar station 110 miles east of Cape Cod, Massachusetts, spot an object 3 miles from their location. They report the sighting to the Coast Guard and request an investigation, but the object sinks before a boat can get there. The object has a controlled light and smoke or steam appears on its surface. The mn watch it for 20 minutes. There is no record of a ship or a submarine in the area. (Lorenzen, UFOs over the Americas, Signet, 1968, p. 53)

September 14 — 3:15 p.m. US Forest Service instructor [Edward A. Grant](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/196580330/edward-annand-grant&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923887639&usg=AOvVaw3waTeaisHcLjXeZz4yAqWq) and his son see a round object over Susanville, California, that at first seems to be a balloon, but is moving erratically. The movements are very fast and the direction changes very definite. They watch it pass overhead for several minutes. Suddenly, a long cylindrical object with fins along its sides appears from the north and passes overhead toward the south. The round object moves very rapidly to intercept the long object, ejecting a yellowish-brown trail, and merges with it. (Herbert S. Taylor, “Satellite Objects: A Further Look,” IUR 29, no. 2 (Summer 2004): 4; [Sparks](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.nicap.org/bb/BB_Unknowns.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923888042&usg=AOvVaw1FfZQLE7UB9C5cJlyeqZ2C), p. 295)

September 19 — Adm. [Roscoe Hillenkoetter](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roscoe_H._Hillenkoetter&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923888289&usg=AOvVaw3JtCVnwm0MuWA9U1cP9-Ky) writes to astronomer [Donald H. Menzel](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Howard_Menzel&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923888502&usg=AOvVaw2ltdGe_6gCNJ4wphyVKPkq), saying that his book The World of Flying Saucers has “effectively put to rest all surmises about flying saucers being from ‘outer space.’” (Christopher D. Allan, “Admiral Hillenkoetter: From Believer to Skeptic,” IUR 20, no. 2 (Mar./Apr. 1995): 17)

September 19 — 6:50 p.m. More than 140 residents of Wonthaggi and South Dudley, Victoria, Australia, observe a mystery object like an orange beach ball maneuver in the sky for 25 minutes. At first it hovers, then it begins moving slowly and silently, putting on sudden and intermittent bursts of speed, before disappearing in an easterly direction into the Bass Strait. During the 25 minutes that the object is visible, TV sets malfunction in South Dudley, Wonthaggi, and lnverlock. TV sets variously display white screens, gray screens, double images, or snow and lines. Still other sets go completely blank. After the UFO leaves at 7:15, all TV sets resume normal operation. (“[UAO’s Upset TV Reception,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://files.afu.se/Downloads/Magazines/United%2520States/APRO%2520Bulletin/APRO%2520Bulletin%2520-%25201964%252005%252000%2520-%2520May.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923889066&usg=AOvVaw3IhISu5TbroTDidCVFFyYd)” APRO Bulletin, May 1964, pp. 1, 6; [Schopick](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://cufos.org/books/A_Study_of_Secondary_Effects-An_Unpublished_Manuscript_of_UFO_E-M_Cases.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923889395&usg=AOvVaw2KPMSGnfgyKXCMcrVfpSZe), pp. 109–111)

September 19 — 8:00 p.m. Four children in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, see a bright, oval object hover in a field and drop something. Approaching the site, they are confronted by a man about 10 feet tall dressed in a white “monk-like” suit who holds out his hands and makes unintelligible sounds. The children flee, and one girl is admitted to the hospital in shock. (Vallée, Magonia, [p. 294](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/passporttomagoni0000vall/page/294/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923889801&usg=AOvVaw18Vp_bae-Sf0FNT34RybTD); Mark Cashman, “Behavioral Classification System for UFO Occupants,” IUR 24, no. 1 (Spring 1999): 18)

September 27 — Blue Book releases a statement on the [Hill](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barney_and_Betty_Hill&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923890294&usg=AOvVaw29RDgiCX2kkLi55nU_mT1P) case, claiming insufficient information, although they strongly suspect the UFO is the planet Jupiter. (Clark III 581)

October — Maj. [Hector Quintanilla](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hector_Quintanilla&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923890781&usg=AOvVaw1WUxtpkt_pi8slYlfFvqA-) is appointed director of Project Blue Book. He is assisted by Sgt. David Moody, who is particularly hostile to UFOs and tends to label every report as “possible” this or that. ([Sparks](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.nicap.org/bb/BB_Unknowns.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923891052&usg=AOvVaw3BjvtyEaVQenzPsRy2dXVu), p. 14; Clark III 922–923)

* * *

October — A Lisunov Li-2 airliner on the Guangdong to Wuhan, China, air route is chased by three luminous UFOs for 115 minutes. The pilots provide a minute-by-minute report by radio to the Chinese Civil Aeronautics Administration. After landing, the crew is debriefed by air traffic control, and the passengers are told not to discuss the incident with anyone. (Wendelle Stevens and Paul Dong, UFOs over Modern China, UFO Photo Archives, 1983, pp. 44–45)

October — 9:30 p.m. Five members of a family in Millersport, Ohio, see what seems to be an airplane on fire, but the house-sized object approaches and hovers about 300 feet away. They see a dark disc with a dome and antenna on top and three ball-shaped protrusions on the bottom. Around the rim are evenly spaced openings that emit fiery beams. In the dome, several large windows are visible in which a figure can be seen, at least by the mother. The dome rotates as the object hovers, and it makes a low humming noise. It finally rises slowly and makes a small circle in the air before speeding away. (Michael Swords, “[Close Encounters of the First Kind: Do We Really](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://thebiggeststudy.blogspot.com/2012/02/close-encounters-of-first-kind-do-we_15.html&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923891807&usg=AOvVaw0toS5WWqBbYyqMM7RMf9ec) [Care? Part Two,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://thebiggeststudy.blogspot.com/2012/02/close-encounters-of-first-kind-do-we_15.html&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923892138&usg=AOvVaw0h9rl_n8Q34K2fF8yB3qWe)” The Big Study, February 15, 2012)

October 4 — 1:00 p.m. Connecticut State Representative [Luther B. Martin](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/69002462/luther-b-martin&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923892399&usg=AOvVaw2gv5BBwPJOYZQ7A7vwhlY3) sees a delta-shaped, silvery object leaving a flare-like trail at Hartland, Connecticut. A row of black markings is visible along the blunt forward edge as the object passes from south to north. He estimates its speed at 2,000 mph. (“[UFO Sightings Centered in Western](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://cufos.org/UFOI_and_Selected_Documents/UFOI/022%2520DEC-JAN%25201963-64.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923892669&usg=AOvVaw2Jajb8dpDOXQhzIp0CRZUo) [U.S.,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://cufos.org/UFOI_and_Selected_Documents/UFOI/022%2520DEC-JAN%25201963-64.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923892884&usg=AOvVaw35VO3Za7nNk3eAEg42S7U-)” UFO Investigator 2, no. 10 (Dec. 1963/Jan. 1964): 3)

October 12 — 3:30 a.m. Driving in a blinding rainstorm on the road between Monte Maíz and Isla Verde, Córdoba, Argentina, Eugenio Douglas feels heat and a prickly sensation all over his body. He sees a brilliant light in front of him. Temporarily blinded, he loses control of his truck and ends up in the ditch. Shaken but not injured, he gets out of the vehicle and looks up at the road, which he finds is blocked by an oval-shaped object at least 30 feet high. A door opens on the side and three huge “robots in human form” emerge. They wear helmets with short antennas and are 12–15 feet tall. Douglas takes a few shots at them with his revolver and runs away. The robots return to the UFO, which chases him down the road and eventually flies away. The next day, police find large footprints near the abandoned truck. (Gordon Creighton, “[Argentina, 1963–64,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%252C1965%252CNov-Dec%252CV%252011%252CN%25206.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923893305&usg=AOvVaw2Mf91wf1MmN0MbR5wGPLox)” Flying Saucer Review 11, no. 6 (Nov./Dec. 1965): 16–17; Clark III 280; Loren E. Gross, [The Fifth Horseman of the Apocalypse: UFOs, a](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-July-Dec.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923893624&usg=AOvVaw0yBSnvnXhPTY6ycAo21TqL) [History: July–December 1963](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-July-Dec.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923893844&usg=AOvVaw191E0nETe74XXfBw9_MVXQ)[,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-July-Dec.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923893997&usg=AOvVaw2jx5GgVH4oigM6LEbRB4Bq) The Author, 2005, pp. 64–65; Roberto Banchs, “Monte Maíz, Cordoba: La Vision Fantasmagorica de E. Douglas (11 Oct 1963),” Visión OVNI, November 10, 2008)

October 21 — 9:30 p.m. Yolié del Valle Moreno and her family at Trancas, Tucumán, Argentina, observe six strange objects for 40 minutes in the back courtyard of their house. One UFO hovers at ground level above some railroad tracks, while another with a dome and portholes is near another house. They can see some 40 humanlike figures (silhouettes) moving around within two bright lights linked by a prolongation or tube. When witnesses flash a light at the object, the house is flooded with a strong beam. The temperature rises inside the house and the inhabitants smell a strong sulfurous odor. All six objects are about 24 feet in diameter, have a white and a red beam of light, and leave a cloud of white smoke that does not disperse for 4 hours. Beneath the space where one of the objects has been rocking back and forth, the witnesses find innumerable white balls one-quarter-inch in diameter piled into a cone 3 feet high and within a circle 28–30 feet in diameter. They consist primarily of calcium carbonate. (Gordon Creighton, “[Argentina 1963–64, Part II,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%25201966%2520V%252012%2520N%25201.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923894704&usg=AOvVaw02er79mkqrUscnD_CaFv38)” Flying Saucer Review 12, no. 1 (Jan./Feb. 1966): 23–24; Oscar A. Galindez, “[Trancas, after Seven Years,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%25201971%2520V%252017%2520N%25203.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923895018&usg=AOvVaw1OZlS7v9hjDhIU66THAwES)” Flying Saucer Review 17, no. 3 (May/June 1971): 14–20, 32; Loren E. Gross, [The Fifth Horseman of the Apocalypse: UFOs, a History: July–December](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-July-Dec.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923895346&usg=AOvVaw2XmOJl2SU7Y3uHhQ11kC1Z) [1963](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-July-Dec.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923895539&usg=AOvVaw1TJGLQU5jW4P8Au5_IHrdo)[,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://sohp.us/collections/ufos-a-history/pdf/GROSS-1963-July-Dec.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923895692&usg=AOvVaw1ahlOU_IR4EMDJdrLU6OyU) The Author, 2005, pp. 66–74; Carlos Iurchuk, “Los Asombrosos Fenomenos de Trancas por el Dr. Oscar Galindez,” Visión OVNI, January 1, 2009)

October 23 — 11:00 p.m. Driving south of South River, New Jersey, on State Route 18, a man glimpses something like a flashlight off to his left, and three figures, 3–4 feet tall, cross the road in front of him. They are dressed in “tight- fitting silver-gray one-piece suits” that “seem to glow once they hit the headlights.” Their heads are found, but the witness can see no other features. They begin quickly “fluttering” across the road, faster than the “fastest sprinter.” (Center for UFO Studies, \[[case documents](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.cufos.org/cases/1963_10_23_US_NJ_nr-South-River_MUFON_Smith-CE-III.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923896337&usg=AOvVaw1fHVbdffK2KoYUa02dQATR)\]; Clark III 278)

October 31 — Eight-year-old Rute de Souza hears a strange roar and watches a silvery object coming towards her house near Iguape, São Paulo, Brazil. It soars above her, hits a palm tree, gyrates a bit in the air, then falls into the Rio Peropava near the opposite shore. She runs to get her mother and uncle, who also hear the sound. They see the river boiling up in the spot, followed by an eruption of muddy water and mud. Fishermen, including Tetsuo Ioshigawa, also view the event. The UFO is estimated to be 25 feet in diameter. Divers, both equipped and unequipped, fail to find any wreckage in the river, which is only 12 feet deep. (“[Disc Submerged in Brazilian](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://files.afu.se/Downloads/Magazines/United%2520States/APRO%2520Bulletin/APRO%2520Bulletin%2520-%25201964%252001%252000%2520-%2520January.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923896831&usg=AOvVaw3QHlDPDu1SjZQW9J2xyzwa) [River,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://files.afu.se/Downloads/Magazines/United%2520States/APRO%2520Bulletin/APRO%2520Bulletin%2520-%25201964%252001%252000%2520-%2520January.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923897107&usg=AOvVaw1mgg9n4lSdWiRhm2YALyqm)” APRO Bulletin, January 1964, pp. 1–2; Harry E. Rieseberg, “[A Submerged UFO?](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.waterufo.net/item.php?id%3D272&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923897433&usg=AOvVaw34H69_J8gJboPQ_YkeWXbF)” Exploring the Unknown 6, no. 2 (December 1965): 64–67; Brazil 517)

November — 5:00 p.m. A man and his daughter are driving just north of Andover, New Jersey, when they see three strange lights in the sky. They are perfect ovals possibly a quarter mile high. The lights take off at a great speed in “perfect unison” toward the north. (Center for UFO Studies, \[[case documents](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://cufos.org/cases/1963_11_00_US_NJ_Andover_CUFOS_Howell-CE-I_redacted.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923898059&usg=AOvVaw3Pz9q7LGUSQQXSN2LQM-mg)\])

November 1 — A member of the CIA-trained 35th Black Cat Squadron, Republic of China pilot [Yeh Changti](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yeh_Changti&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923898317&usg=AOvVaw3N3cdGadP1at_hWbJU51nq) is flying an American U-2 reconnaissance aircraft to spy on China’s nuclear program when he is shot down by an SA-2 missile over Shangrao, Jiangxi, and held in mainland China until 1982. Yeh is incarcerated for four years and undergoes numerous interrogations. Although some claim he was tortured, Yeh later says he was treated humanely. After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, he is released and sent to work on a farm, before being transferred to work at Hanyang Arsenal in Wuhan. (Wikipedia, “[Yeh Changti](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yeh_Changti&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923898577&usg=AOvVaw262Ex4iD-Y88wXevSXDFMX)”; Jacobsen, Area 51, [pp. 216–218](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://archive.org/details/area51uncensored0000jaco/page/216/mode/2up&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923898782&usg=AOvVaw08PBMgiTzFJnj_xe1GPRBZ))

November 3 — The [Hills](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barney_and_Betty_Hill&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923899143&usg=AOvVaw3-AfZRZgd7AgXzDX3tscmy) give a presentation at the Two State UFO Study Group in Quincy Center, Massachusetts. One of the attendees tape-records the session. Another speaker at the session is Capt. [Ben Swett](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/201838384/ben-h_-swett&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923899574&usg=AOvVaw3aLqRZzK4w4AbGlPYrDvS4) of Pease AFB, himself a practicing hypnotist, who tells them he thinks hypnotic regression is a good idea. (Clark III 584)

November 12 — The crew of the Argentine Naval auxiliary transport, [ARA Punta Médanos](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ARA_Punta_M%25C3%25A9danos_(B-18)&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923900104&usg=AOvVaw04L9MUS72Z_Ht6UyaOzXYw), sees a large UFO off its stern \[in the Atlantic Ocean?\]. It is moving at high speed; when it appears, the needles of the ship’s magnetic compass suddenly and simultaneously swing off course, pointing towards the UFO, which is about 6,000 feet away. The compasses return to normal after the object leaves. (“[Argentine Navy Discloses Important E-M Case,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://cufos.org/UFOI_and_Selected_Documents/UFOI/028%2520AUG-SEPT%25201965.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923900556&usg=AOvVaw2pLsKE1k4xuPrdoyOmq5sH)” UFO Investigator 3, no. 4 (Aug./Sept. 1965): 6; [Schopick](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://cufos.org/books/A_Study_of_Secondary_Effects-An_Unpublished_Manuscript_of_UFO_E-M_Cases.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923901060&usg=AOvVaw0hvRUTFdNj6g-vN7T82Vha)[,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://cufos.org/books/A_Study_of_Secondary_Effects-An_Unpublished_Manuscript_of_UFO_E-M_Cases.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923901372&usg=AOvVaw0WPWgv3I1yA5_Ao6YQ8RPW) pp. 3–4)

November 16 — Evening. Four teenagers—John Flaxton, Mervyn Hutchinson, Jenny Holloway, and another youth—are in Sandling Park near Saltwood, Kent, England, when they see a moving reddish-yellow “star” above the woods. It comes down at an angle of 60°, then vanishes. Moments later, they see a bright, golden light in a field about 240 feet away, floating 10 feet above the ground, and seemingly 15–20 feet across. It seems to move along with the teens for a short while. It disappears behind trees, then a dark figure shambles out of the woods. It is all black, about the size of a human but without a head and has bat wings. The teenagers run away. Other witnesses come forward to report strange lights and giant footprints in the woods. (Charles A. Strickland, “[Sightings at Saltwood,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://files.afu.se/Downloads/Magazines/United%2520Kingdom/BUFORA%2520-%25201959-1963%2520LUFORO%2520BULLETIN%2520Vols.1%2520to%25204/LUFORO%2520Bulletin%2520-%2520Vol%25204%2520No%252005%2520-%2520Nov-Dec-Jan%25201963-64%2520FINAL.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923902154&usg=AOvVaw2oq54UsWX50-NxeblBQrt6) [near Hythe, Kent,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://files.afu.se/Downloads/Magazines/United%2520Kingdom/BUFORA%2520-%25201959-1963%2520LUFORO%2520BULLETIN%2520Vols.1%2520to%25204/LUFORO%2520Bulletin%2520-%2520Vol%25204%2520No%252005%2520-%2520Nov-Dec-Jan%25201963-64%2520FINAL.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923902668&usg=AOvVaw3vdNqMLC8oLUEn4fTkQmoH)” LUFORO Bulletin 4, no. 5 (Nov./Dec./Jan. 1963–1964): 2–3; “[The Saltwood Mystery: Strange](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%252C1964%252CMar-Apr%252CV%252010%252CN%25202.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923903202&usg=AOvVaw3Nw7KsBNOIceZbsh6VeuiW) [Happenings in Kent,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%252C1964%252CMar-Apr%252CV%252010%252CN%25202.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923903558&usg=AOvVaw0C3WWfGNjlCyhj2PwgBvbF)” Flying Saucer Review 10, no. 2(Mar./Apr. 1964): 11–12; A. Cecil Harper, “[A Saltwood](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://files.afu.se/Downloads/Magazines/United%2520Kingdom/BUFORA%2520-%25201964-1981%2520BUFORA%2520JOURNAL%2520Vols.1%2520to%252010/BUFORA%2520Journal%2520-%2520Volume%252001%2520No%252001%2520-%2520Summer%25201964.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923904218&usg=AOvVaw130cmB8FujSRC58PVv-b-I) [Sighting,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://files.afu.se/Downloads/Magazines/United%2520Kingdom/BUFORA%2520-%25201964-1981%2520BUFORA%2520JOURNAL%2520Vols.1%2520to%252010/BUFORA%2520Journal%2520-%2520Volume%252001%2520No%252001%2520-%2520Summer%25201964.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923904703&usg=AOvVaw1DfY_zjfWjk5bhKdCNnkoB)” BUFORA Journal and Bulletin 1, no. 1 (Summer 1964): 12; Nick Redfern, “[An Update on a Sinister](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2018/06/an-update-on-a-sinister-winged-monster/&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923905261&usg=AOvVaw2NDfp9QLBADU50wyTNk4tO) [Winged Monster,](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2018/06/an-update-on-a-sinister-winged-monster/&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923905607&usg=AOvVaw0lFPuzBG6y1nKSPOTPorTP)” Mysterious Universe, June 14, 2018; Theo Paijmans, “The Headless Horrors of Sandling Road,” Fortean Times 374 (Christmas 2018): 30–31; Clark III 779)

November 17 — [Jacques Vallée](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jacques_Vall%25C3%25A9e&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923906224&usg=AOvVaw2qf3Xx9pRzZKDHuFJdw6Zh) meets [J. Allen Hynek](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._Allen_Hynek&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923906576&usg=AOvVaw0KqxEJUJt0HP9Rq33b9QGG) for the first time at his residence in Evanston, Illinois. He begins actively assisting Hynek in his UFO work and helping him analyze Project Blue Book data. (Clark III 1213)

November 20 — 6:00 p.m. Capt. J. Murray and three members of the crew of the Aberdeen collier Thrift see a flashing red light as they are traveling south in the North Sea from Aberdeen to Blyth, Northumberland, England. It passes within a mile of their port side, 15–30 feet above sea level and suddenly disappears 3 miles astern, presumably into the water. The collier, which puts about and makes for the object’s vanishing point, has 2 radar contacts on its screens, but they disappear as the ship approaches. They search for 3 hours but find no wreckage. (“[Mystery at](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%252C1964%252CMar-Apr%252CV%252010%252CN%25202.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923907252&usg=AOvVaw1KCVOh9VdmjZt_Jkggs_EU) [Sea,](https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/ufologia/FSR%252C1964%252CMar-Apr%252CV%252010%252CN%25202.pdf&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923907464&usg=AOvVaw31EA0TaXTYY1RFb19C5H5C)” Flying Saucer Review 10, no. 2 (Mar./Apr. 1964): 22)

November 22 — President [John F. Kennedy](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_F._Kennedy&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923907783&usg=AOvVaw3IrYMfmLRXAakBtYo3Dkox) is assassinated in Dallas, Texas, by [Lee Harvey Oswald](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lee_Harvey_Oswald&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1674889923908082&usg=AOvVaw2tm6zYW9_-CvxVN5sU-nT6).
